    • getProducts

      @GetMapping("/findAllProducts") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getProducts()
      Retrieves a list of products.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for displaying products

    • getProductsByPrice

      @GetMapping("/sortByPrice") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getProductsByPrice(@RequestParam(required=false) String sortOrder)
      Retrieves a list of products sorted by price.
      Parameters:
      sortOrder - The sorting order. Can be "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending. Optional parameter.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for displaying sorted products

    • insertProduct

      @PostMapping("/insertProduct") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertProduct(@RequestParam("name") String name, @RequestParam("price") double price, @RequestParam("stock") int stock, @RequestParam("categoryName") String categoryName, @RequestParam("categoryAnimal") String categoryAnimal, @RequestParam("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image)
      Inserts a new product into the system.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product.
      price - The price of the product.
      stock - The stock quantity of the product.
      categoryName - The category name of the product.
      categoryAnimal - The animal category of the product.
      image - The image file of the product.
      Returns:
      ModelAndView for redirecting to the list of all products with success or error message.

    • getProductById

      @GetMapping("findById/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ProductDTO> getProductById(@PathVariable("id") String productId)
      Returns the product with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to be retrieved

    • updateProductP

      @PostMapping("/updateProduct/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateProductP(@PathVariable("id") String productId, ProductDTO productDTO, @RequestParam("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image)
      Updates a product.
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to be updated
      productDTO - The object containing the new information for the product to be updated
      image - The image file of the product
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object representing the updated product

    • updateProduct

      @PutMapping("/updateP/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateProduct(@PathVariable("id") String productId, ProductDTO productDTO, @RequestParam("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image)
      Updates a product.

      A ModelAndView object representing the updated product

      @PostMapping("/removeProduct/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView removeProduct(@PathVariable("id") String productId)
      Deletes a product.

      productId - The ID of the product to be deleted
